author: Simon Difford
description: Rich and jammy flavours balanced by bourbon and lemon juice.
name: Jambouree
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
22.5 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR preserve with bourbon in base of shaker until mostly dissolved
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
